Audrey.name: Audrey
Audrey.description: Kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, run attack run kittens climb the curtains jump, stuck in a tree judging you sleep in the sink feed me sniff. Scratched tail flick catnip catnip sleep on your face fluffy fur, sleep on your face sniff jump lick toss the mousie sleep in the sink.

Thomas.name: Thomas
Thomas.description: Kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, sleep on your keyboard claw climb the curtains sleep on your face sniff kittens, jump climb the curtains jump judging you. Climb the curtains I don't like that food hiss sunbathe meow, stretching toss the mousie puking kittens tail flick feed me eat the grass.

Whitney.name: Whitney
Whitney.description: Kitty ipsum dolor sit amet, puking fluffy fur biting scratched sniff, jump on the table chase the red dot fluffy fur attack knock over the lamp sleep in the sink. Rip the couch sleep in the sink rip the couch attack, stuck in a tree stretching eat the grass run puking attack your ankles.
